tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE wrestler_profiles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
    championship_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE wrestler_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    championships VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE championships (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(50),
    year INT,
    winner_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES wrestler_profiles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE wrestler_profiles (
    wrestler_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    championship_history TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE championships_history (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    wrestler_id INT,
    title_id INT,
    date_won DATE,
    date_lost DATE
);

CREATE TABLE wrestler_details (
    wrestler_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    birthdate DATE,
    height DECIMAL(4,2),
    hometown VARCHAR(50),
    wrestling_style VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE wrestler_profiles (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    championship_history VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE matches (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    match_type VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE,
    winner_id INT,
    loser_id INT
);
